articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Foreign Political Party Delegations
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Foreign Political Party Delegations
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with foreign political party delegations which paid courtesy calls on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Sunday.
					 They included a delegation of the United Socialist Nationalist Party of Nepal led by General Secretary of its Central Committee Shankarlal Shrestha, a delegation of the Mongolian People's Revolutionary Party led by General Secretary E. Erdenejamyan, a delegation of the Bangladesh Jatiya Party led by Secretary General of its National Executive Council Mostafa Jamal Haider and a delegation of the Islamic Coalition Party of Iran led by First Vice-General Secretary Seyed Mehdi Joulaee.

articles.title: Talks Held between WPK and SPM
articles.content:
Talks Held between WPK and SPM
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Talks between Ri Su Yong, Politburo member and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), and Grigore Novac, vice-chairman of the National Council of the Socialist Party of Moldova (SPM) were held here on Sunday.
					 At the talks both sides informed each other of their party activities and had an exchange of their views on the issue of boosting the bilateral relations and issues of mutual concern. 
					
					 Then an agreement on cooperation between the Workers' Party of Korea and the Socialist Party of Moldova was signed.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong Meets with Mongolian Party Delegation
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong Meets with Mongolian Party Delegation
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Sunday had a talk with a delegation of the Mongolian People's Revolutionary Party led by General Secretary E. Erdenejamyan on a visit to the DPRK on a visit to the DPRK on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Easter Service Held Here
articles.content:
Easter Service Held Here
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Easter services took place at the Pongsu Church and the Chilgol Church on April 16.
					 They were attended by officials of the C.C., the Christian Federation of Korea, priests of those churches and Christians and overseas Koreans and foreigners staying here.
					
					 At the services sermons were preached and prayers were made to vow to make positive contributions to paving a broad avenue to independent reunification by concerted efforts of all Koreans this significant year in which the Korean nation will mark the 45th anniversary of the publication of the historic July 4 joint statement and the 10th anniversary of the October 4 declaration and discharging the duty of Christians in successfully holding the pan-national conference for reunification as an immediate task and thereby make tangible contributions to improving the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 Then a joint prayers agreed with the "Council of Christian Churches in south Korea" was said and the communion services took place to mark Easter.

articles.title: Juche Idea Followers Meet
articles.content:
Juche Idea Followers Meet
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- A meeting between Juche idea followers of the elder generation and the young generation took place at the People's Palace of Culture Sunday under the sponsorship of the International Institute of the Juche Idea (IIJI) on the occasion of the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there were delegations and delegates of groups for the study of the Juche idea from various countries and regions visiting the DPRK on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					
					 Speaking at the meeting were Ramon Jimenez Lopez, director general of the IIJI, Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the IIJI, Edmond Jouve, director-general of the European Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, Manju Ratna Sakya, chairman of the Nepal Journalist Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Politics, Secouna Camara, director general of the Kim Il Sung Institute of Agricultural Science in Guinea, and other Juche idea followers of the elder generation.
					
					 They said the Juche idea, the great guiding idea in the era of independence, the idea which brightly indicates the road of national independence and human emancipation, is the most scientific and revolutionary idea that could be founded only by President Kim Il Sung, genius of ideology and theories. They introduced the successes and experience gained in forming the groups for the study of the Juche idea and conducting activities for its dissemination.
					
					 They stated that the U.S. and the West can never bring down Korean-style socialism as long as there are the army and people who are firmly armed with the Juche idea and are rallied close around respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They stressed that it is a science for socialism in the DPRK, legacy left by the great leaders and being glorified by Kim Jong Un, to triumph.
					
					 Chairman of the Juche Philosophy Study Committee of India Vipin Gupta and other young Juche idea followers expressed their will to conduct more brisk activities to disseminate the Juche idea with the pride and honor of being the followers of the great revolutionary idea most correctly clarifying the new philosophical principle, socio-historical principles and the guiding principles of the revolution and construction. 
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans Feted
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Feted
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- A reception was given for overseas Koreans at the People's Palace of Culture Sunday on the occasion of the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there on invitation were the congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the Day of the Sun led by Kwon Sun Hwi, adviser of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, the congratulatory group of the General Association of Koreans in China for celebrating the Day of the Sun led by Chairwoman Choe Un Bok and other overseas Koreans delegations and overseas Koreans staying in the homeland.
					
					 Present there were Kim Yong Chol, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Jin Guk, director of the Agency of Overseas Korean Affairs, and officials concerned.
					
					 Kim Yong Chol said in his speech that the President fathered the immortal Juche idea and laid a solid groundwork for the prosperity of posterity and led all the Koreans along the road of patriotism.
					
					 He expressed the conviction that the overseas Koreans would hold President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem for all ages and dynamically keep to the path of national reunification and the building of a powerful country under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kwon Sun Hwi praised Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for giving origin to the Juche-based movement of the overseas Koreans and leading it along the road of victory.
					
					 The adviser expressed the will to glorify the idea and cause of the great leaders forever true to the intention of Kim Jong Un and make a patriotic contribution to building the best Paektusan power and accomplishing the cause of the country's reunification by keeping pace with the people in the homeland in their all-out general charge.

articles.title: Reception Given for Families of Those Related to Revolutionary Activities of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Reception Given for Families of Those Related to Revolutionary Activities of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- A reception was given for family members of those related to the revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung from abroad Sunday on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, his birth anniversary.
					 They included families of Zhang Weihua, Zhou Baozhong, Chai Shiying, Jie Qing, Jiang Zihua, Liu Tongshi, Fan Delin, Shang Yue and Hu Zhenyi, Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, and Kim Sun Ok, Pak Kil Song, Kim Chol and So Sun Ok and Ryang Song Ryong, China-resident Koreans related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, and families of an overseas Korean Son Won Thae and Ya. T. Nobichenko, an internationalist soldier.
					
					 Kim Ki Nam, vice-chairman of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, and officials concerned were on hand.
					
					 Kim Ki Nam said in his speech that this benevolent reception was provided by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He noted that in his lifetime the President had always remembered and shown paternal love for the comrades-in-arms abroad, with whom he established relationship during his revolutionary activities, and their bereaved families.
					
					 The noble international obligation of the peerlessly great men of Mt Paektu is now being invariably carried forward by Kim Jong Un, he said.

articles.title: Participants in 5th April Spring People's Art Festival Visit Venue of Kimilsungia Festival
articles.content:
Participants in 5th April Spring People's Art Festival Visit Venue of Kimilsungia Festival
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 5th April Spring People's Art Festival visited the venue of the 19th Kimilsungia Festival Sunday.
					 They were deeply admired by the venue of the festival reminiscent of a sea of beautiful flowers.
					
					 They also visited the national photo exhibition for celebrating the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and others.

articles.title: Delegations, Delegates of Juche Idea Study Organizations Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Delegations, Delegates of Juche Idea Study Organizations Visit Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Delegations and delegates of Juche idea study organizations from different countries staying here to mark the Day of the Sun visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung on Sunday.
					 Recalling the exploits and revolutionary career of the President, the guests looked round with keen interest the mementoes at his old home in Mangyongdae.
					
					 They went round revolutionary relics on Mangyong Hill
					
					 Earlier, they toured the venue of the 19th Kimilsungia Festival.

articles.title: Foreign Party Delegations Visit Venue of Kimilsungia Festival
articles.content:
Foreign Party Delegations Visit Venue of Kimilsungia Festival
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Socialist Party of Moldova, the delegation of the Mongolian People's Revolutionary Party and other foreign party delegations visited the venue of the 19th Kimilsungia Festival.
					 They looked round with deep emotion Kimilsungias in full bloom as famous flower in praise of the great man.
					
					 They also toured Ryomyong Street.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Mongolian Party Delegation
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Mongolian Party Delegation
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from the visiting delegation of the Mongolian People's Revolutionary Party.
					 The gift was conveyed to Ri Su Yong, Politburo member and vice-chairman of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea on Sunday by E. Erdenejamyan, general secretary of the Mongolian People's Revolutionary Party who is heading the delegation.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Socialist Party of Moldova
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Socialist Party of Moldova
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from the Socialist Party of Moldova on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 The gift was handed to Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, on Sunday by Grigore Novac, vice-chairman of the National Council of the Socialist Party of Moldova who is leading the visiting delegation of the Party.

articles.title: Floral Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Delegations and delegates of Juche idea study organizations from different countries and regions visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Sunday on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 They laid floral baskets at the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Foreign Party Delegations Visit Venue of Kimilsungia Festival
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Socialist Party of Moldova, the delegation of the Mongolian People's Revolutionary Party and other foreign party delegations visited the venue of the 19th Kimilsungia Festival.
					 They looked round with deep emotion Kimilsungias in full bloom as famous flower in praise of the great man.
					
					 They also toured Ryomyong Street.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Off Press in India
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Off Press in India
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "Let the Entire Nation Unite and Hasten the Reunification of the Country" was brought out in booklet by the Indian and World Event, a newspaper of India.
					 The work, published on August 18, Juche 79 (1990), clarifies the ways, etc. of reunifying Korea.
					
					 A book releasing ceremony took place at the newspaper office on April 5.

articles.title: Korean Book, Photo and Craftwork Exhibition Held in Russia
articles.content:
Korean Book, Photo and Craftwork Exhibition Held in Russia
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- A DPRK book, photo and craftwork exhibition opened with due ceremony in Sankt-Peterburg City of Russia on April 11 in celebration of the Day of the Sun.
					 On display at the exhibition were photos showing the revolutionary careers and exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the revolutionary activities of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were their works, and books and photos introducing the DPRK and craftwork showing the creative talents of the Korean people.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were political and social figures, masses and those concerned of the press of Russia and the DPRK charge d'affaires ad interim to Russia and his embassy officials.
					
					 A lawmaker of Sankt-Peterburg City said that it is the city's honor to splendidly celebrate the 105th birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the Korean people, adding:
					
					 The President was an outstanding and great man who built socialist Korea with the popular masses as makers of history and made gigantic contributions to strengthening the Workers' Party of Korea and accomplishing the human cause of independence.
					
					 His idea and cause are creditably carried forward by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Korean people will always win victories under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The head of a Russian orchestra said that the President was a benevolent father who made his lifelong dedication to the people's happiness.
					
					 The Korean people, diligent and honest-minded, have grown up to be great with a strong will thanks to the President.
					
					 No people in the world are more blessed with illustrious leaders generation after generation than the Korean people.
					
					 The exhibition goes on till April 21.

articles.title: Korean Book, Photo and Craftwork Exhibition Held in Bulgaria
articles.content:
Korean Book, Photo and Craftwork Exhibition Held in Bulgaria
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- A DPRK book, photo and craftwork exhibition was held with due ceremony in Sofia of Bulgaria from Mar. 30 to April 3, to celebrate the Day of the Sun.
					 Put up in front of its venue were portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 On display at the exhibition were photos showing the exploits of the great leaders and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were their works, and books and photos introducing the DPRK and craftwork showing the resourcefulness and talents of the Korean nation.
					
					 Present there were personages from various political parties, organizations and institutions and masses of Bulgaria, the DPRK ambassador to Bulgaria and his embassy members.
					
					 The honorary chairman of the Bulgarian Communists Union said in a speech that Kim Il Sung was the great leader who built the best socialist country in the world, a benevolent father who devoted all his life to the people's happiness and an distinguished leader who made titanic contributions to ensuring global peace and security.
					
					 The exhibition will help the visitors know better about beautiful Korea with long history and rich culture and the diligent Korean people's talents and contribute to bettering friendship between the two peoples and developing cultural cooperation and exchange between them, he said.
